此路是我开 此树是我栽(‾◡◝).Translation: This road is made by me, this tree is planted by me (‾◡◝)

要想从此过，留下买fu财！.Translation: If you want to pass this way, leave money for me!

（守住码头 是男人就坚持40秒~o( =∩ω∩= )）.Translation: (Defend the dock; if you're a man, hold for 40 seconds~o( =∩ω∩= )）

呜啊~(＞ ＜)☆原来是miku的老公来辣！.Translation: Whoa~(＞ ＜)☆ So it's Miku's husband who's here!

进屋坐坐叭！咱是miku的妹妹米库喵ฅ.Translation: Come in and sit! I'm Miku's sister, Miku meowฅ

（在屋内存活60秒直至后花园门开）.Translation: (Survive indoors for 60 seconds until the back garden door opens)

（僵尸10秒后传送至厕所）.Translation: (Zombies will teleport to the restroom in 10 seconds)

咱记得钓鱼台上的钻石块是树屋开关喵Ծ‸Ծ.Translation: I remember the diamond block on the fishing platform is the treehouse switch, meow Ծ‸Ծ

海的对面是敌人啊....Translation: The enemy is across the sea...

啊咧！_(:з」∠)_马桶里爬出了怪怪的东西.Translation: Oh no! _(:з」∠)_ Something weird crawled out of the toilet.

(僵尸20秒后传送，开润！）.Translation: (Zombies will teleport in 20 seconds, let’s go!)

(僵尸被阻挡5秒，快跑！！(o゜▽゜)o☆）.Translation: (Zombies are blocked for 5 seconds, run!! (o゜▽゜)o☆)

啊咧 忘记平常这里是死路咧！Σ( °Д °.Translation: Oh no! I forgot this is usually a dead end! Σ( °Д °)

˃̶͈ ˂̶͈ 康来只能走夜袭（划掉）的秘密通道了.Translation: ˃̶͈ ˂̶͈ I can only use the secret passage for night raids (crossed out).

那咱就从这里下去吧！.Translation: Then let's go down from here!

三个字，让大家多守40秒(/ω＼).Translation: Three words, let everyone hold for 40 more seconds (/ω＼)

漂流瓶里闪闪发光的是钥匙捏ο(=•ω＜=)ρ⌒☆.Translation: The shining thing in the bottle is a key, yo ο(=•ω＜=)ρ⌒☆

让我们去酒馆做做吧.Translation: Let's go to the tavern and do something.

啊咧⊙▾⊙酒馆被海盗霸占了 还是绕个路吧！.Translation: Oh no⊙▾⊙ The tavern is occupied by pirates, let's take a detour!

让咱想想走哪里好捏！.Translation: Let me think about where to go!

右侧二楼小屋有一个通往哨站的梯子捏！.Translation: There’s a ladder to the watchtower in the small room on the second floor to the right!

咱记得二楼小屋开关在秋千旁来着.Translation: I remember the switch for the second-floor small room is next to the swing.

侧路暂时无法通行哦喵~( ╯▽╰).Translation: The side road is temporarily impassable, meow~( ╯▽╰)

二楼门30秒后打开喵！.Translation: The second-floor door will open in 30 seconds, meow!

（侧路15秒后开放）.Translation: (The side road will open in 15 seconds)

试试走哨站再绕进酒馆！.Translation: Let's try going through the watchtower and then into the tavern!

呜啊 好烧啊φ(゜▽゜)♪.Translation: Oh no, it's so hot φ(゜▽゜)♪

咱精通撬锁17余年，撬个烟囱也不在话下！.Translation: I've been proficient in lock picking for over 17 years, picking a chimney is no problem!

（给米库30秒撬烟囱时间）.Translation: (Give Miku 30 seconds to pick the chimney)

哨站顶部有一个钟.Translation: There’s a bell at the top of the watchtower.

敲响它或许就能扰乱海盗的注意力！.Translation: Ring it, and it might distract the pirates!

海盗们果然都被吸引到岸边了捏！.Translation: The pirates have indeed been drawn to the shore!

我们就光明正大地从哨站门口走出去吧！.Translation: Let's walk out openly from the entrance of the watchtower!

拉动门卫室的拉杆就能开门了(/≧▽≦)/.Translation: Pull the lever in the guard room to open the door (/≧▽≦)/

(大门25秒后打开).Translation: (The main door will open in 25 seconds)

进酒馆小酌一杯( /ω＼).Translation: Let's go into the tavern for a drink ( /ω＼)

老板，温两碗酒，来一碟茴香豆。.Translation: Boss, warm up two bowls of wine and bring a plate of fennel beans.

真是的 这么着急领我进屋吖(/ω＼).Translation: Really, you're so eager to take me inside (/ω＼)

⊙▽⊙海盗又鲨回来了 咱们快跑.Translation: ⊙▽⊙ The pirates are back, let's run!

可是楼下已经被包围了.Translation: But the downstairs is already surrounded.

看来只能走窗户了喵！.Translation: It seems we can only escape through the window, meow!

海盗这会儿都在酒馆.Translation: The pirates are all at the tavern right now.

那咱们就趁虚而入 端了他们的老窝♪(´∇`).Translation: Then let's sneak in and take over their hideout♪(´∇`)

根据咱多年坐船全球巡回演唱的经历.Translation: Based on my years of experience touring the world by boat

船舱开关一定在船舵旁边！^O^.Translation: The cabin switch must be next to the helm! ^O^

船舱在40秒后打开.Translation: The cabin will open in 40 seconds.

潜入舰长室计划开始ヾ(≧O≦)〃.Translation: The plan to infiltrate the captain's room beginsヾ(≧O≦)〃

康来没办法从正门进入舰长室了！.Translation: I can't enter the captain's room through the front door!

会不会有秘密通道捏（´v｀）.Translation: Could there be a secret passage? (´v｀)

咱就说的吧 果然脚下有秘密通道╰(°▽°)╯.Translation: I told you! There really is a secret passage underfoot ╰(°▽°)╯

朝着最后一个房间前进吧！.Translation: Let's head to the last room!

守住这扇铁门咱们就成功辣(/≧▽≦)/.Translation: If we hold this iron door, we will succeed (/≧▽≦)/

此刻开始我们要征服星辰大海！！.Translation: From this moment on, we will conquer the stars and the sea!!

剧终 感谢游玩！~o( =∩ω∩= )m.Translation: The end. Thank you for playing! ~o( =∩ω∩= )m

I made this road. I planted this tree (‾.Translation: I made this road. I planted this tree (‾◡◝)

If you want to pass this way, leave mone.Translation: If you want to pass this way, leave money for me!

Hold the dock. If you're a man, hold it.Translation: Hold the dock. If you're a man, hold it for 40 seconds. ~o( =∩ω∩= )

Come in and have a seat! I'm Miku's sist.Translation: Come in and have a seat! I'm Miku's sister, Meow ฅ

Survive in the house for 60 seconds unt.Translation: Survive in the house for 60 seconds until the back garden door opens

Can't you believe that, we're back meow~.Translation: Can't you believe that, we're back meow~

If you stay here, you'll be punished! ο(.Translation: If you stay here, you'll be punished! ο(=•ω＜=)ρ⌒☆

The portal has been closed meow! Σ(っ °Д.Translation: The portal has been closed meow! Σ(っ °Д °

Zombies teleport to the bathroom in 10.Translation: Zombies teleport to the bathroom in 10 seconds

Remember that the diamond block on the f.Translation: Remember that the diamond block on the fishing platform is the treehouse's switch, meow Ծ‸Ծ

The enemies are across the sea....Translation: The enemies are across the sea...

Ahhhh! _(:з」∠)_ Something weird crawled.Translation: Ahhhh! _(:з」∠)_ Something weird crawled out of the toilet!

The treehouse will open in 60 seconds.Translation: The treehouse will open in 60 seconds
